mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_RATING, PROD_IMG_THUM, PROD_CNT FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PROD_STATUS = '판매중' AND PROD_CREATED_AT BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND CURDATE() ORDER BY PROD_CNT DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_RATING, PROD_IMG_THUM, PROD_CNT FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PROD_STATUS = '판매중' AND CAT_NO = 11 ORDER BY PROD_CNT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS no, B.BOARD_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS "user.nickname", -- 작성자 닉네임 B.BOARD_CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, B.BOARD_VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt FROM BOARDS B LEFT JOIN USERS U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE B.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY B.BOARD_VIEW_CNT DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT MARATHON_NO AS no, MARATHON_TITLE AS title, MARATHON_DATE AS marathonDate, APPLY_START_DATE AS startDate, APPLY_END_DATE AS endDate FROM MARATHONS WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY MARATHON_CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT LESSON_NO AS lessonNo, LESSON_TITLE AS title, LESSON_SUBJECT AS subject, LESSON_PLACE AS place, PARTICIPANT as participant, LESSON_START_DATE AS start, LESSON_END_DATE AS end FROM LESSONS WHERE LESSON_STATUS = '모집중' ORDER BY LESSON_CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 3
